column4: I have asus a43s system, touchpad stops working sometime and the only solution is to restart the system, any help ?
When it stops working, try entering 'sudo modprobe -r psmouse && sudo modprobe psmouse resetafter=10' in a terminal
If it works, create a file like '/etc/modprobe.d/touchpad-fix.conf' with the contents 'options psmouse resetafter=10'
